Labor.description: Labor in a hazardous environment, risking injury but earning rewards.

rewards.bond: I spent years breaking my back for _____, yet they never paid me what I deserved.

rewards.bond: I fixed a critical breakdown at _____ when no one else could.

rewards.bond: I endured the chaos from the _____ and kept the operation running.

rewards.bond: I uncovered a flaw at _____ that saved us a fortune.

rewards.bond: I worked overtime for my boss _____ when it mattered most.

Labor.description: Witness your jobs competition falter.

rewards.bond: The misfortune at a rival plant on _____ paved the way for our success.

Labor.description: Install a new piece of machinery and train others in its operation.

rewards.bond: I became the go-to expert on new technology at our facility.

rewards.bond: The explosion I witnessed almost killed me, but thanks to my friend _____, I survived.
